channel.title: How to edit class
channel.description: How do you edit a class? I am trying to edit this part of my combatassistant.java that makes it so that spawned npcs cant be attacked I deleted that and compiled but they still couldnt be attacked so I checked in my combathandler.class using zbyte searcher and the code that says "this npc wasn't spawned for you" and makes it so you cant attack is still in there and I have no idea how to edit the class I also tried to use the compiler in there and got this error javac: file not found: *.java so can anyone help me here thanks bye!

item.title: How to edit class
item.dc:creator: @elatechris elatechris
item.description:
@elatechris wrote:

you were right but my actual problem wasnt answered thanks anyways I figured out the prob one compile error prevented the class from updating I must have clicked out of the compiler b4 I saw it said error anyways its fixed now

Read full topic

item.title: How to edit class
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“elatechris, post:1, topic:421989”]How do you edit a class? I am trying to edit this part of my combatassistant.java that makes it so that spawned npcs cant be attacked I deleted that and compiled but they still couldnt be attacked so I checked in my combathandler.class using zbyte searcher and the code that says “this npc wasn’t spawned for you” and makes it so you cant attack is still in there and I have no idea how to edit the class I also tried to use the compiler in there and got this error
javac: file not found: *.java so can anyone help me here thanks bye![/quote]

It means that you haven’t modified the path variable to include the JDK. There are plenty of tutorials here, along with a quick google search.

Read full topic
